name: photo-of-the-day-november-5-2008
title: Photo Of The Day: November 5, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: We’ve been so distracted by colorful leaves and a certain election that we forget we’re in Music City. The band is The Airborn Toxic Event, the venue is Exit In, and the photographer is Mr.Tooley. Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
contentEncoded:
We’ve been so distracted by colorful leaves and a certain election that we forget we’re in Music City. The band is The Airborn Toxic Event, the venue is Exit In, and the photographer is Mr.Tooley.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
